channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump wants purchase of $200 billion in mortgage bonds. What that means for mortgage rates.
item.description: Freddie and Fannie have been growing their mortgage bond holdings in recent months, but the 30-year fixed mortgage is still above 6%.

item.title: We paid my daughter and son-in-law’s mortgage when it reached $76K. Here’s why we chose that magic figure.
item.description: “My husband, daughter, son-in-law and I all went to the bank.”

item.title: Rio Tinto may buy Glencore to form mining leader with copper prices near record
item.description: Rio Tinto may buy Glencore to create the biggest mining company, both companies said on Friday, in a deal that comes as metals prices have soared.

item.title: ‘It’s been a struggle getting payments from her’: I rent a house to our daughter. Do I just gift her the house?
item.description: “She would be responsible for taxes and insurance, which should be manageable.”

item.title: ‘I’m at a crossroads’: I have $35K left on my mortgage at 3% interest. Do I dip into my $700K IRA to pay it off?
item.description: “Over the last year, my two retirement accounts averaged a 15% gain.”

item.title: Friday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Investors rotated out of tech names, dragging the Nasdaq Composite lower on Thursday.

item.title: AI adopters: These stocks are going to see the biggest revenue boost from deploying the tech, says Trivariate Research
item.description: Shopify, Alphabet and ServiceNow are among the companies that Adam Parker's firm says could get a revenue lift from using AI.

item.title: Dividend growth stocks offer attractive returns with less risk, Nuveen finds. Analysts like these names
item.description: Companies that regularly raise their dividends can help protect portfolios in volatile times. A CNBC Pro screen turned up several names beloved by Wal...

item.title: Retail traders had one of their best years ever in 2025. Here's what they're buying now
item.description: Retail investors are rushing back into the market coming off a strong 2025. They're especially focused on energy stocks this time.

item.title: Regional banks are well set up entering 2026, with one set to be a big winner, says Jay Woods
item.description: Jay Woods takes a look at the technicals in the regional banking space.

item.title: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) Soars on Promising Inflammation Drug Data
item.description: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) stock surges over 42% on positive Phase 1 data for MRT-8102, showing profound reductions in inflammation marker hsCRP. ...

item.title: FIGR Stock Jumps Big on Blockchain Lending Wave
item.description: Discover why Figure Technology Solutions (FIGR) surged 21.67% today amid blockchain advancements like $YLDS and RWA Consortium. Learn trading lessons,...

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...

item.title: Intuitive Machines Stock Rockets on Analyst Upgrade
item.description: Meta description: Intuitive Machines (LUNR) stock rockets 37% on KeyBanc overweight rating and $20 target amid lunar contract potential. Discover risk...

item.title: Sable Offshore Stock Surges on Trump Admin Pipeline Boost
